hero.description: Easy-to-use GPS tracking system, giving you full control over your cars, motorcycles, or fleet. Monitor location, speed, and route history with intuitive tools.
hero.ctaNote: No credit cards required - 14 days free trial.

features.description: Experience our GPS tracking system with real-time monitoring, geofencing, alerts, and route history.
features.real_time_tracking: Real-time tracking for vehicles, motorcycles, and assets with accurate location data.
features.dashboard_desc: Unlock productivity with customizable dashboards for tracking and managing your fleet in real-time.
features.ui_desc: Powerful and intuitive UI components designed for GPS tracking, alerts, and reporting.
features.drag_drop_desc: Easily configure and manage GPS tracking dashboards and elements with our drag-and-drop interface.

faq.heading: FAQs
faq.description: We help users track their vehicles easily and securely with our GPS system.

faqs.question: How do I install the GPS tracker on my motorcycle?
faqs.answer: Installation is simple and quick. Just place the tracker in a secure location on the bike and connect it to the power if needed.

faqs.question: Can I track multiple motorcycles from the same app?
faqs.answer: Yes, our platform allows you to manage and track multiple bikes or vehicles in real time from a single, intuitive dashboard.

faqs.question: What happens if my motorcycle is stolen?
faqs.answer: In case of suspicious movement or theft, you will receive an instant alert on your phone or by email.

faqs.question: Does the GPS work everywhere in Algeria?
faqs.answer: Yes, our trackers use a reliable GSM/GPS network that covers the entire Algerian territory, even in remote areas.

faqs.question: Can I create geofenced areas for my vehicles?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can define allowed or forbidden zones and receive notifications if a vehicle leaves the area.
